review: Efficient Doctor, explained my problem so well and the treatment also. The staff wasVery Well behaved . . The clinic was neat and clean. The doctor was friendly and made me feel comfortable and relaxed. Treatment was very satisfying.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
At the very outset Dr. Kumra makes you feel at ease and comfortable. She explains the problem and diagnosis with clarity and uses easy to understand terminology. 
Besides taking care of the problematic teeth, she advises on preventive measures, maintenance and hygiene of your teeth. This is a very unique aspect of Dr Kumra's practice. It is very rare that a doctor spends time for such advice. 
Dr Kundra is very soft spoken and gentle which made me feel comfortable and confident that I had come to the right place. 
Last but not the least , her clinic is spotlessly clean with very high standard of hygiene.  And her staff is very well trained for their respective assignments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been coming to the clinic for the past 3-4 years. Everytime i visit from the UK, i always come to the clinic for a checkup and teeth whitening. I prefer it more than UK dental care system. The clinic is very supportive and client friendly and they ensure that their client is getting the best treatment. The doctor is very sweet and polite, she explains everything in detail before carrying forward any kind of procedure. The clinic is not only well maintained with good staff *** ********* *** **** ** *** ** *** **** * **** **** ***

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Madhu is very meticulous and she focuses on all the details. She explains the dental problem and the line of treatment well. The treatment is very well planned. She sees to it that the patient gets the best treatment and care.  ***  ** ****** ************  ** ********* ***** ******* ** ****** ***********
I will highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Very humble & comforting. Explained the health issue completely. 
Very patient & the best at her work.

tags: None
review: I visited Dr.Madhumani for problem with my ongoing treatment for root canal with another Dentist. The moment i landed at her clinic, the place had a very soothing ambience. I found the clinic to very professionally run. The staff was very courteous. Dr. Kumra very patiently understood my situation & through technology could easily explain the problem that i was going through & the way forward. She took time out to explain to me the systems & processes that are being followed in her clinic on sterilization all the instruments used in her clinic.I would highly recommend her to my family & friends.

tags: None
review: Dr Kumra has extended a very professional service on my first visit with consecutive follow ups. I was highly impressed by her state of the art clinic. I went in for a root canal and tooth inflammation. Her experience & expertise took care of treating my tooth ache in the short time I had on my short visit to India -- Her taking out time to explain what the procedure was to be & what is to follow, gave me great assurance to come back, each time I visit Delhi, for my dental care visit. My dental work has been taken care off, much to my great satisfaction. Thank you Dr. Kumra, see you in March of 2016 !

tags: None
review: I had gone for a root canal to Ms. Kumra. I had heard horror stories of root canal procedures and the painful stories and I was extremely terrified. To top it all I have a fear of needles so the fear factor was really high. Ms. Kumra patiently explained the procedure, took care of my fears and was very gentle throughout. The procedure was done very nicely and I must confess it was nothing like the horror stories I had heard! It was almost painless. I would highly recommend Ms. Kumra. A big thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
She was ever smiling, described the steps simultaneously while carrying on procedure. Very confident. Teaching the staff nurse and Doctors simultaneously. Taking response of the patient throughout while carrying on procedure, making the patient(myself) at ease and comfortable.

Wonderful experience !!

tags: None
review: Got my scaling and polishing procedure done by Dr. Utkarsha under the supervision of Dr. Kumra. She ensured that I was comfortable during the procedure and it was completely painless. They also educated me about the correct ways to maintain my oral hygiene for a healthier mouth in the long term.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a good experience. The doctor is competent and pleasant. For a dental treatment she was very reassuring and I have planned to come again for further treatment. I would recommend her highly. The clinic is also very clean and uncluttered with soothing music and nice aroma. Overall a great experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My daughter is 3yrs old and unfortunately she has to go through root canal. As we all know it's very painful but with the help of  doctors and the staff it become a bit easy. Dr. Madhumani is such a nice lady and she has loads of patience to handle kids. So far I'm very happy and satisfy from her services

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Every time I visit Dr. Kumra, I get to see her efficiency and expertise. Which is terrific.

She is also a very hard task master. Her juniors keep getting stern instructions from her on their methods. This is how they get better in their work. She is a not just an excellent dental practitioner; she is also a wonderful teacher. As a teacher myself, I should probably use some of her methods on my students‚Ä¶

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent and pleasant experience as always! Dr. Kumra is my go to dentist and her clinic is super neat, clean and spacious and all covid protocols are being strictly followed.

My family and I only trust her and her clinic especially during these unprecendented times. 

Her staff is also super nice and friendly. Would highly recommend Smayate Dental Clinic and Dr. Kumra to everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: had 3 teeth extracted and at the same time implants put in  . Got this done in the middle of the second wave of the covid pendamic.  It was amazing that all care was taken to keep me and the doctors and the assistants safe from exposure to any thing. Whats more is that ive recovered from the surgery and can't wait to get the teeth put in. Thank you Dr Kumra, for your patience and the excellent care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Kumra has an excellent eye aesthetics & a gentle hand. Her understanding of global best practices and explaining patients the need for a prescribed procedure gives one a lot of confidence. I am very happy with the treatment.....coming to Smayate's calm environment takes the stress out of a dental visit !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Kumra did a  very thorough checkup and explained the issues very clearly so I could take an decision about my treatment. She discussed the entire treatment and plan very patiently. Since my treatment requires implants  and therefore expensive she also shared how it could be staged so that I could get it done in bits. I was in pain a couple of times due to the extent of damage in the teeth and gums I had to reach out to her and she responded immediately and I got relief soon after the treatment was complete.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I always come to Dr. Madhumani  for my dental problems as I feel comfortable in her diagnosis and treatment. Earlier, my parents used to come to her for several years due to the faith in her diagnosis and treatment. My sister also visits her.

tags: None
review: What I found as a refreshing change was the education given to me about my problem  by  the doctor and this was accompanied by a presentation of different options available to me for treatment, simple practices to improve the level of oral hygiene. All this and a patient friendly soothing ambience makes this a pleasantly different  experience.

review: My experience with Dr. Kumra has been a 100% breeze! Dr. Kumra is not only highly knowledgeable and experiences, but extremely calm and easy to talk to. Don't think any further if you want a caring & expert hand for your dental woes!!

review: It is her in-depth manner of explaining the he problem that anyone can easily understand. She did the complete treatment which required just two visits.
